attributes.action: REPATRIATION PETITION. PEOPLE COMING INTO BRITAIN WHO DO NOT RESPECT THE LAW
attributes.additional_details: OVER THE PAST 10 YEARS THERE HAS BEEN A MASSIVE INFLUX FROM MANY COUNTRY'S OUT SIDE OF BRITAIN WHO COME FROM MANY CULTURES, MANY HAVE FITTED IN WITH OUR LAWS AND CULTURE, HOWEVER THERE HAS BEEN MANY FROM COUNTRY'S WHO HAVE A CULTURE WHERE IT IS NOT ACCEPTABLE HERE IN BRITAIN AND IS CRIMINAL UNDER BRITISH LAWS, THESE PEOPLE HAVE STATED THEY WILL NOT INTEGRATE OR ACCEPT OUR BRITISH LAWS. WE  WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO PASS A BILL INTO LAW ALLOWING THESE PEOPLE TO BE SENT BACK TO THEIR HOME LANDS AGAIN
attributes.background:
ANY PERSON WHO COMES INTO BRITAIN AND IGNORES THE BRITISH LAWS AND CULTURE AND WHO DOES NOT INTEND TO INTEGRATE AND SHARE THESE VALUES AND WHO INTENDS TO INCITES UNREST BETWEEN THE INDIGENOUS PEOPLE SHOULD BE MADE TO BE SENT BACK TO THEIR HOME COUNTRY AGAIN 

More details

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
